refnamediv.refpurpose:
arrays
renaming
rename Change array name

refsect1.title: Summary
refsect1.para: The AFL rename operator works like the AQL statement SELECT * INTO except that the old array name can be reused immediately with the rename operator.

The rename operator is akin to using the Unix mv (move) command, whereas SELECT * INTO is akin to the Unix cp (copy) command. The argument named_array must be an array that was previously created and stored in the SciDB namespace.

informalexample.para: Create an array named source, show its name and schema, rename it, and show its new name and schema. Note that the array ID remains the same.--afl store(build(<val:double>[i=0:9,10,0],1),source); --show-output=no --afl list('arrays'); --output-format=csv --show-output-in-test-file=no --afl rename(source,target); --show-output=no --afl list('arrays'); --output-format=csv --show-output-in-test-file=no
